data.eml:eml: Subdivision of the tribe Oligaphorurini in the light of new and lesser known species from North-East Russia (Collembola, Onychiuridae, Onychiurinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Babenko, Anatoly B., Fjellberg, Arne (2015): Subdivision of the tribe Oligaphorurini in the light of new and lesser known species from North-East Russia (Collembola, Onychiuridae, Onychiurinae). ZooKeys 488: 47-75, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.488.8123, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.488.8123
